metadata.title: USN-3825-1 -- mod_perl vulnerability
metadata.description: Jan Ingvoldstad discovered that mod_perl incorrectly handled configuration options to disable being used by unprivileged users, contrary to the documentation. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary Perl code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3825-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libapache2-mod-perl2 - 2.0.9-4ubuntu1.2 libapache2-mod-perl2-doc - 2.0.9-4ubuntu1.2 libapache2-mod-perl2-dev - 2.0.9-4ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
